# ‚ú® Cloudflare Firewall Rules Website

> #### A Cloudflare interface to bulk add / edit your firewall rules using Cloudflare's API wrapper.

Cloudflare Firewall Rules Web is an interface that aims to easily create, modify, delete rules. It also provides a way to import & export new rules in your domain's firewall.

If you have some rules that you want to duplicate among your domains, this website is made for you!

### This project uses the [Cloudflare-Firewall-Rules](https://github.com/QuentiumYT/Cloudflare-Firewall-Rules) Python module

![Website preview](/images/preview.png)

## üì• Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/QuentiumYT/Cloudflare-Firewall-Rules-Web.git
cd Cloudflare-Firewall-Rules-Web/
# Install Python requirements
pip install -r requirements.txt
# Install dev dependencies (css related)
npm install
# Install web dependencies
cd static/ && npm install
```

## üöÄ Usage

```bash
# Build CSS
npm run build
# Run Flask app
python app.py
```

You can now navigate to [127.0.0.1:5502](http://127.0.0.1:5502)

---

Create and edit rules using the online editor

More usage doc to come

If you don't feel comfortable coding, you can submit your idea about what you would like to see implemented.
